title: My League causes my PC to crash
body: So I have a problem with my league client. I have a windows 10 PC and league was working perfectly before I decided to reset  my PC as it was slowing down; I ended up resetting it twice. After that, everything was working properly but when I tried to play league, it would almost always crash instantly when I loaded into a game. If it didn't crash, it kind of lagged but not really. My FPS seemed bad although the performance indicator said I had 60 FPS which is what I normally have. Also my sound seemed buggy and the game just felt clunky. Since I play on the KR servers, I thought if I played on my NA account, there wouldn't be a problem but the same issue happened on NA. Please help me someone T.T I just wanna play league again :(

replies.body:
It sounds like some the recent Windows 10 Anniversary update may be causing issues for you. Some players are experiencing issues with full system lockups and low FPS after the recent updates enabled Xbox Game DVR by default. I recommend you [disable these features entirely](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) to see if it resolves your issue. 

Let me know if this helped.
